definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Ili Kazakh autonomous prefecture in Xinjiang
pinyin: Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

pinyin: Ba1 li3 kun1 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

pinyin: Mu4 lei3 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

definition: Aksai Kazakh autonomous county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu
pinyin: A1 ke4 sai4 Ha1 sa4 ke4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4
containing_words.word: 阿克塞哈萨克族自治县

sentences.english: It's also a popular traditional game among local Kazaks.
sentences.chinese: 也是哈萨克男女特别喜欢的一种传统游戏。

sentences.english: Last year he went to Kazakstan.
sentences.chinese: 去年，他去了哈萨克斯坦。

sentences.english: “Kazakh children were stunted compared to the same-age Russian children, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: 与俄罗斯同龄儿童相比，哈萨克的儿童发育不良。

sentences.english: Rustam Yargaliyev was Kazakhstan's top scorer with 26 points.
sentences.chinese: 哈萨克斯坦的某某得了比赛的最高的26分。

sentences.english: The post-position word is a kind of function word in the modern Kazakh language.
sentences.chinese: 后置词是现代哈萨克语虚词的一种。

sentences.english: Increasingly, Kazakhstan is becoming an important bridge between East and West.
sentences.chinese: 哈萨克斯坦渐渐发展为连接中西方的桥梁。

sentences.english: Kazak weddings are like a concert.
sentences.chinese: 哈萨克族婚礼简直就是一场歌会。

sentences.english: SCO anti-terror drill kicks off in Kazakhstan .
sentences.chinese: 上海合作组织反恐演习在哈萨克斯坦揭幕。

sentences.english: Many of the Kazakh and Mongol stock-herders are still at least seminomadic.
sentences.chinese: 许多哈萨克和蒙古族的牧民依然过着半游牧的生活。

sentences.english: The Kazakhs treated us to their best cream tea.
sentences.chinese: 这些哈萨克人请我们吃了他们最好的奶茶。

sentences.english: Up to now, Kazak people retain the historical memory of yuci from which they come.
sentences.chinese: 直至今日，哈萨克人依然保留其玉兹属性的历史记忆。

sentences.english: Dombra (a plucked string instrument) is often used for accompaniment during the performance.
sentences.chinese: 表演时，用哈萨克族的弹拨乐器“冬不拉”伴奏。

sentences.english: Dongbula is a plucked stringed instrument of the Kazak ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 冬不拉哈萨克族弹拨乐器。
这就是哈萨克族的鹰猎。

sentences.english: Could you introduce briefly the sports exchange of Kazakstan with other countries?
sentences.chinese: 您能谈谈哈萨克斯坦与世界各国的体育交流情况吗？

sentences.english: When they communicate with their Kazak neighbors, they speak Kazak.
sentences.chinese: 和周边的哈萨克人交流时就会用哈语。

definition: Tajik ethnic group/Tajikistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Xinjiang and Afghanistan
Turkmenistan/Republic of Turkmenistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Iran
Tuva, a republic in south-central Siberia, Russia
Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)
Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
